languages.text: Король заинтригован — еще ни один смертный не попытался снискать его божественного благословения. Вам необходимо лишь объявить Амберворлд своим и не вмешиваться в происходящее на планете. Если король останется вами доволен — он даже позволит взимать со своих игрушек дань.

traits.locale_text: Король заинтригован — еще ни один смертный не попытался снискать его божественного благословения. Вам необходимо лишь объявить Амберворлд своим и не вмешиваться в происходящее на планете. Если король останется вами доволен — он даже позволить взимать со своих игрушек дань.

languages.text: The King is intrigued: never before has a mortal sought to obtain his divine blessing. All you have to do is claim ownership of Amberworld and not interfere with the events unfolding on the planet. If the King is pleased with you, he may even let you collect tribute from his playthings.
languages.original_text: Король заинтригован — еще ни один смертный не попытался снискать его божественного благословения. Вам необходимо лишь объявить Амберворлд своим и не вмешиваться в происходящее на планете. Если король останется вами доволен — он даже позволит взимать со своих игрушек дань.

traits.locale_text: The king is intrigued: never before has a mortal sought to obtain his divine blessing. All you have to do is claim ownership of Amberworld and not interfere into the events unfolding on the planet. If the king is pleased with you, he may even let you collect tribute from his playthings.

The King is intrigued: never before has a mortal sought to obtain his divine blessing. All you have to do is claim ownership of Amberworld and not interfere with the events unfolding on the planet. If the King is pleased with you, he may even let you collect tribute from his playthings.

languages.text: 国王很感兴趣，因为之前从来没有哪个凡人渴求他的神圣祝福。你所要做的事情，就是宣称琥珀世界归你所有，并且不干涉这颗行星上发生的一切。如果国王对你满意，他可能甚至会允许你从他的玩物手中收取属于你的贡品。
languages.original_text: The King is intrigued: never before has a mortal sought to obtain his divine blessing. All you have to do is claim ownership of Amberworld and not interfere with the events unfolding on the planet. If the King is pleased with you, he may even let you collect tribute from his playthings.

traits.locale_text: 国王很感兴趣，因为之前从来没有哪个凡人渴求他的神圣祝福。你所要做的事情，就是宣称琥珀世界归你所有，并且不干涉这颗行星上发生的一切。如果国王对你满意，他可能甚至会允许你从他的玩物手中收取属于你的贡品。

languages.text: El rey está intrigado: nunca antes ha intentado un mortal obtener su bendición divina. Lo único que tienes que hacer es reclamar Ámbar como tuyo y no interferir en lo que ocurre en el planeta. Si el rey está satisfecho contigo, puede que incluso te permita recaudar un tributo de sus marionetas.
languages.original_text: The King is intrigued: never before has a mortal sought to obtain his divine blessing. All you have to do is claim ownership of Amberworld and not interfere with the events unfolding on the planet. If the King is pleased with you, he may even let you collect tribute from his playthings.

traits.locale_text: El rey está intrigado: nunca antes ha intentado un mortal obtener su bendición divina. Lo único que tienes que hacer es reclamar Ámbar como tuyo y no interferir en lo que ocurre en el planeta. Si el rey está satisfecho contigo, puede que incluso te permita recaudar un tributo de sus marionetas.

languages.text: 王は興味をそそられる。かつて神の恵みを得ようとする人間はいなかったからだ。己のすべきことは、アンバーワールドの所有権を主張し、この惑星で繰り広げられる出来事に干渉しないことだ。王が気に入れば、彼の遊び道具から貢ぎ物だって集められるかもしれない。
languages.original_text: The King is intrigued: never before has a mortal sought to obtain his divine blessing. All you have to do is claim ownership of Amberworld and not interfere with the events unfolding on the planet. If the King is pleased with you, he may even let you collect tribute from his playthings.

traits.locale_text: 王は興味をそそられる。かつて神の恵みを得ようとする人間はいなかったからだ。己のすべきことは、アンバーワールドの所有権を主張し、この惑星で繰り広げられる出来事に干渉しないことだ。王が気に入れば、彼の遊び道具から貢ぎ物だって集められるかもしれない。

languages.text: Der König ist fasziniert. Noch nie zuvor hat ein Sterblicher um seinen göttlichen Segen gebeten. Du musst lediglich Amberworld für dich beanspruchen und dich nicht in die Ereignisse auf dem Planeten einmischen. Wenn der König zufrieden mit dir ist, lässt er dich vielleicht sogar Tribut von seinen Spielsachen eintreiben.
languages.original_text: The King is intrigued: never before has a mortal sought to obtain his divine blessing. All you have to do is claim ownership of Amberworld and not interfere with the events unfolding on the planet. If the King is pleased with you, he may even let you collect tribute from his playthings.

traits.locale_text: Der König ist fasziniert. Noch nie zuvor hat ein Sterblicher um seinen göttlichen Segen gebeten. Du musst lediglich Amberworld für dich beanspruchen und dich nicht in die Ereignisse auf dem Planeten einmischen. Wenn der König zufrieden mit dir ist, lässt er dich vielleicht sogar Tribut von seinen Spielsachen eintreiben.

languages.text: Le Roi est intrigué : jamais auparavant un mortel n'avait cherché à profiter de sa bénédiction divine. La seule chose que vous avez à faire est de revendiquer Ambremonde et ne pas interférer avec ce qui se passe sur la planète. Si le Roi est satisfait, il vous laissera peut-être extorquer un tribut à ses jouets.
languages.original_text: The King is intrigued: never before has a mortal sought to obtain his divine blessing. All you have to do is claim ownership of Amberworld and not interfere with the events unfolding on the planet. If the King is pleased with you, he may even let you collect tribute from his playthings.

traits.locale_text: Le Roi est intrigué : jamais auparavant un mortel n'avait cherché à profiter de sa bénédiction divine. La seule chose que vous avez à faire est de revendiquer le monde de l'Ambre et ne pas interférer avec ce qui se passe sur la planète. Si le Roi est satisfait, il vous laissera peut-être extorquer un tribut à ses jouets.

languages.text: Kral ilgileniyor: Daha önce hiçbir ölümlü onun ilahi lütfunu talep etmeye cüret etmemişti. Tek yapman gereken, Kehribardünya'nın kontrolünü üstlenmek ve gezegende gelişen olaylara müdahale etmemek. Eğer Kral senden memnun kalırsa oyuncaklarından haraç toplamana bile izin verebilir.
languages.original_text: The King is intrigued: never before has a mortal sought to obtain his divine blessing. All you have to do is claim ownership of Amberworld and not interfere with the events unfolding on the planet. If the King is pleased with you, he may even let you collect tribute from his playthings.
